title: Bruce Springsteen's Nebraska: A Celebration In Words and Music
overview: Join Eric Church, Emmylou Harris, Noah Kahan, Lyle Lovett, The Lumineers and Lucinda Williams for an in-depth exploration of the 1982 album. Hosted by famed music biographer Warren Zanes, the program features performances of Springsteenâ€™s songs with spoken word storytelling.
